display.title: Electrolyse what's left!
description: Some dusts in &&bGregTech&&r have little use other than to be processed in an &&3Electrolyser&&r for some nice bonus chemical outputs. You can either set a manual filter for the desired items in a &&aStorage Bus&&r, or provide the most vital dusts via ME Interface, for example.

subtitle.text: We don't need THIS much Cobaltite, right?
